elements.name: No-op internal marker
elements.summary: Internal placeholder element used to keep base bond ruleset deterministically sorted; not used by examples.

elements.name: OAuth provider
elements.summary: External auth provider integration.

elements.name: Session auth
elements.summary: Cookie/session-based auth boundary.

elements.name: CDN cache
elements.summary: Edge caching for performance.

elements.name: Consensus
elements.summary: Consensus capability for replicated state machines (e.g., leader election + log agreement).

elements.name: Replication
elements.summary: Replication of state/log across nodes with failure handling.

elements.name: Feature flags
elements.summary: Gate capabilities safely.

elements.name: Decentralized identity (DID)
elements.summary: Optional DID support, non-custodial.

elements.name: Reusable identity account
elements.summary: Reusable account/login anchored in wallet signatures and/or portable identity bindings.

elements.name: API client
elements.summary: Call third-party APIs with retries.

elements.name: Webhooks
elements.summary: Outbound event delivery to external systems.

elements.name: ABI/contract
elements.summary: Versioned ABI or runtime contract with compatibility guarantees.

elements.name: Isolation model
elements.summary: Isolation between execution contexts (process/VM/container).

elements.name: Sandboxing
elements.summary: Sandbox environment enforcing least privilege and containment.

elements.name: Toolchain build
elements.summary: Build artifacts produced by toolchain with verification needs.

elements.name: Breaking change at boundary
elements.summary: A boundary change that breaks consumer compatibility. Requires a version bump and compatibility window discipline.

elements.name: Event stream boundary
elements.summary: An event stream boundary (pub/sub). Requires schema/contract versioning and compatibility tests.

elements.name: File/artifact exchange boundary
elements.summary: Integration via files/artifacts (exports/imports). Requires schema/versioning discipline and integrity checks.

elements.name: HTTP API boundary
elements.summary: A network API boundary intended for inter-domain integration. Requires explicit interface spec, versioning, and compatibility tests.

elements.name: HTTP API boundary (taint all)
elements.summary: HTTP API boundary that conservatively propagates taint across the membrane (sticky taint). Safety-first default for high-stakes domains; may reduce usability via over-tainting.

elements.name: HTTP API boundary (taint none)
elements.summary: HTTP API boundary that drops taint at the membrane (fully de-tainting). High usability but risky for privacy/safety domains unless justified by evidence/declassification.

elements.name: HTTP API boundary (taint precise)
elements.summary: HTTP API boundary with precise taint propagation: taint is preserved until an explicit sanitizer/declassifier discharges it. Balanced correctness/usability.

elements.name: Webhook boundary
elements.summary: A webhook boundary (HTTP callbacks). Requires an explicit interface spec, contract versioning, and compatibility tests.

elements.name: ML lifecycle surface
elements.summary: System claims ML model training/evaluation/deploy lifecycle responsibility (even if externalized).

elements.name: Email notifications
elements.summary: Send email notifications via kit.

elements.name: Push notifications
elements.summary: Mobile/web push channel.

elements.name: SMS notifications
elements.summary: SMS channel (cost + compliance).

elements.name: Structured logs
elements.summary: Correlatable structured logging.

elements.name: Metrics
elements.summary: Collect latency/traffic/error/saturation.

elements.name: Tracing
elements.summary: Distributed tracing for latency diagnosis.

elements.name: Proof-carrying claims
elements.summary: Claims are presented with verifiable proofs; verification does not require full disclosure.

elements.name: Selective disclosure
elements.summary: Ability to prove a claim while revealing only the minimum necessary information.

elements.name: Job queue
elements.summary: Background job queue + workers.

elements.name: Rate limiting
elements.summary: Protect services from abuse.

elements.name: Deadlines
elements.summary: Explicit deadline constraints on operations.

elements.name: Interrupt-driven execution
elements.summary: Interrupt sources drive scheduling and preemption behavior.

elements.name: Full-text search
elements.summary: Index for text search + filters.

elements.name: Attribute-based access control
elements.summary: Policy rules based on attributes.

elements.name: Role-based access control
elements.summary: Roles + permissions + guards.

elements.name: Deterministic tick
elements.summary: Fixed-step deterministic simulation tick for replayability.

elements.name: Simulation netcode
elements.summary: Networked simulation requiring sync, reconciliation, or rollback strategies.

elements.name: Blob storage
elements.summary: Object storage for user files.

elements.name: Key-value storage
elements.summary: Fast key-based persistence.

elements.name: SQL database
elements.summary: Relational persistence for core records.

elements.name: No-pack dummy capability
elements.summary: Regression-only element in domain 'no_pack_test' to ensure pack completeness is enforced.

elements.name: Deterministic builds
elements.summary: Build outputs are reproducible under identical inputs/tooling.

elements.name: Escrow/conditional commitment
elements.summary: Value locked under conditions (palette-selected).

elements.name: Wallet transaction
elements.summary: Non-custodial wallet signing + submit.
